body:
I was reading the spanish translation (not  here) and the sister loves romantically her brother before he rapes her. The brother has a twisted familiar love, and don't want to be alone and the sister saw the first rape as an oportunity to manipulate the brother to fuck and stay with her (She says her brother don't love her, he is terrified of being alone, but she really loves him as a man. So both are menhera in the begining.
Also the girl likes the rapey sex.
Pls translate this, im curious. The last one seems quite bad

One more note, his sister is way WAY too considerate. It might be just her overwhelming love or because she actually wanted it to happen but the brother for this time is really desperate to make sure that his sister is his. Personally, I liked the other MC in Ohayou but hey, dis da gud shit.
It's practically the same plot as the last one except there's the other guy shown and the main MC is a lot more direct. There's also a little feeling of NTR?  I don't know but it feels likes it.
Is this even the same series anymore? >.>
If someone can send me the translations I can do all the editing. I do a lot of manga projects

If you ask me translations, you will die.
Never seems like anyone is giving a damm of this rule.
